net.jordaria.debug

Class DebugPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.debug.DebugPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Listener

    public class DebugPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, Listener
    This is a very volatile class which contains a JFrame with buttons for use in testing various parts of the game and engines.
    Author:
    Ches Burks
